personaA.message:
You have 1 missed call.

Transcript:

Hello Elena,

This is Karen calling from the medical oncology team.

I'm calling to schedule your first chemo appointment.

I understand you were seeking counseling to decide whether you wanted to undergo fertility preservation treatment before the chemo starts.

As discussed, given the stage of your cancer, it's very important to begin chemo as soon as possible to reduce the chances of progression.

Please call me back on 713-555-6341 extension 231 as soon as possible.

personaB.message:
You have 1 missed call.

Transcript:

Hello Reena,

This is Sarah calling from Dr Matthews's office.

Have you scheduled your appointment with a medical oncologist yet? We need that information to know where to send medical records. Depending on their systems, they may need to initiate the request via fax. We need to make sure all of this is done before your appointment so they have what they need to make the right treatment decision.

Please call me back once you've spoken to their office so I can start whichever process they prefer.

Sarah

personaC.message:
You have 1 missed call.

Transcript:

Hi Cathy

This is Dr. Nichols. I'm calling about your genetic test results. Can you give me a call back please. I'm on 814-415-9805 extension 21.

Thank you

personaD.message:
Hi Mama,

I think I've found a potential new doctor who looks really good. She's based at Emory, maybe a 45 mins drive from you?

I can get you scheduled for after Christmas but that would mean more treatment delays. Do you want to wait or go with your current doc so you can get on those meds straight away?
